description:
Megumin has become acquainted with Father Zesta of the Axis Sect, just in time for him to be arrested thanks to a letter delivered by Yunyun. Can the two Crimson Demons repay his hospitality by proving his innocence?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Les fanatiques de la cité de l`eau
水の都の狂信者達[ファナティック]
